attributes.action: Investigate senior Labour officials who plotted to undermine Corbyn's leadership
attributes.additional_details: The actions of this group of Labour officials may have affected the election result. This contravenes the democratic process.
attributes.background: As reported in the Independent on 13th April, leaked evidence shows that during the 2019 election, senior Labour officials allocated resources to undermine Jeremy Corbyn's leadership and by extension, the democratic process. The government needs to investigate and hold those responsible to account.

rejection.details:
This is a matter for the Labour Party, not the UK Government or Parliament. If you wish to express your concerns to them, you can find their contact details here: https://labour.org.uk/contact/.

If your local MP is a member of the Labour Party, you could also contact them and encourage them to raise your concerns within the Party. You can find your MP's contact details by entering your post code here: https://members.parliament.uk/FindYourMP.
